pkgmetadata.longdescription: APLpy (the Astronomical Plotting Library in Python) is a Python module aimed at producing publication-quality plots of astronomical imaging data in FITS format. The module uses Matplotlib. It is capable of creating output files in several graphical formats, including EPS, PDF, PS, PNG, and SVG.
